text: A leadership election was held by the Malaysian Chinese Association (MCA) on 21 December 2013. It was won by then Deputy President of MCA, Liow Tiong Lai. ==Central Committee election results== Source ===President=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !! Delegates' votes |- | align=left| Liow Tiong Lai || 1,186 votes |- | colspan=3 bgcolor=dcdcdc| |- | align=left| Gan Ping Sieu || 1,000 votes |- | align=left| Ong Tee Keat || 160 votes |} ===Deputy President=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! Candidate !!
